resources.string: Being aware of the early signs and symptoms of breast cancer can save your life.When the disease is detected in its early stages,the range of treatments available is wider and more diverse,and the chances of a complete recovery are very high.

Most lumps discovered in the breast are not malignant, however, the most common early sign of breast cancer in both women and men is the appearance of a lump or thickening in the breast tissue.This lump is usually painless.
Symptoms of breast cancer include the following:

A clear or blood-like discharge from the nipple, sometimes with the appearance of a tumor in the breast. A retracted or indented nipple. A change in the size or shape of the breast. Flattening or indenting of the skin covering the breast.The appearance of redness or something similar to wrinkled skin on the surface of the breast, like an orange peel.
Taking some steps to change your lifestyle can be an effective factor in reducing your risk of breast cancer,
Eat foods rich in dietary fiber.
